pageContext.claim: “Because if you look at Broward -- and Palm Beach, to a lesser extent -- if you look at Broward County, they have had a horrible history. And if you look at the person -- in this case, a woman -- involved, she has had a horrible history. And all of a sudden, they're finding votes out of nowhere.”
pageContext.analysis: Broward County was the center of the 2000 presidential election scandal. However, it takes time to count all the votes, including absentee ballots. What the president is describing is more counting than "finding." Plus, there's no evidence of voter fraud.
